# [Using The Editor](/docs/editor) / Params Panel

The Params Panel allows you to edit the various parameters for each node.

<DocImage src="docs/editor/panels/params.jpg" alt="Polygonjs Params Panel" />

We'll document what you can do here more in depth in the future, but in the mean time, here are the key shortcuts:

-   `middle click on a number field`: opens a custom slider that allows you to change its value by moving your mouse left and right.
-   `right click on a param label`: opens up the param context menu.
